summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of East 50th Street, from 48th Avenue Northeast to 50th Avenue Northeast, providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and for the making of the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the property abutting on said street; and providing that the entire cost of such improvement shall be paid from the City Street Fund.
